intro: Psychotria allenii, commonly known as the Allen's psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pinkish flowers. It produces small, dark blue berries that are toxic to humans and animals. Psychotria allenii is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests.
